function.name: LREAL_TO_WSTRING
function.comment: Converts LREAL to WSTRING value. One integer digit, dot, 14 mantisa characters, 'E±', 3 characters of mantisa. If value is negative then include '-' character before whole number. Always occupies approx. 22 characters.
